title: School Rumble San Gakki
original_name: スクールランブル三学期
opening_song: "Scramble (スクランブル)" by Yui Horie with UNSCANDAL
ending_song: #1: "Onna no Ko♥Otoko no Ko (Tsukamoto Sisters ver.) (オンナのコ ♥ オトコのコ(塚本姉妹 ver.))" by Ami Koshimizu & Mamiko Noto (ep 1)
sinopse: A short 2 episodes attempt to conclude the series. Karasuma goes to America after the end of the third term. Will Harima finally confess? What will happen with Tenma and Karasuma?
